meta.title: ILLA Cloud Components
meta.description: ILLA provides a range of commonly used front-end development components, enabling users to easily build front-end interfaces and respond to user actions and display data through simple drag-and-drop operations. In addition, users can construct complex components such as tables, charts, forms, lists, and more through the platform. This simple approach empowers users to effortlessly create complex components.

headerContent.title: Library of built-in components
headerContent.description: ILLA provides a range of commonly used front-end development components, enabling users to easily build front-end interfaces and respond to user actions and display data through simple drag-and-drop operations. Users can construct complex components such as tables, charts, forms, lists, and more through ILLA.

contentList.name: Upload
contentList.description: The 'Upload' component in ILLA Cloud provides a way for users to upload any type of files to their application.

contentList.name: Switch
contentList.description: The 'Switch' component in ILLA Cloud provides a toggle switch that allows users to turn on or turn off a particular setting or feature.

contentList.name: Select
contentList.description: The 'Select' component in ILLA Cloud is a drop-down selector that allows users to choose from a list of options, providing a user-friendly and space-efficient way to input data.

contentList.name: Radio group
contentList.description: The 'Radio Group' component in ILLA Cloud is a radio selector that allows users to choose one option from a list of choices, providing a simple and clear way to input and manage data.

contentList.name: Checkbox Group
contentList.description: The 'Checkbox Group' component in ILLA Cloud is a checkbox selector that allows users to select multiple options from a list, providing a simple and efficient way to manage data.

contentList.name: Chart
contentList.description: The 'Chart' component in ILLA Cloud displays multiple types of charts based on linked data, providing users with clear and visually appealing representations of complex data.

contentList.name: Tables
contentList.description: The 'Table' component in ILLA Cloud displays data from a database in a tabular format, making it easy for users to view, sort, and analyze large amounts of information at a glance.

contentList.name: PDF
contentList.description: The 'PDF' component in ILLA Cloud is a display element that allows users to view and interact with PDF files within the application.

contentList.name: Video
contentList.description: The 'Video' component in ILLA Cloud is a display element that allows users to play and interact with videos within the application.

12.name: Appwrite
12.description: An open-source backend server platform that provides authentication, database, and storage services for web and mobile applications.

13.name: Oracle DB
13.description: A high-performance, scalable relational database management system that offers a comprehensive set of features and tools.

14.name: CouchDB
14.description: A NoSQL document-oriented database that provides a distributed architecture with incremental replication and conflict detection.

15.name: Microsoft SQL Server
15.description: A relational database management system developed by Microsoft that supports transaction processing, business intelligence, and analytics applications.

16.name: Neon
16.description: The fully managed multi-cloud Postgres with a generous free tier. We separated storage and compute to offer autoscaling, branching, and bottomless storage.

6.name: Google Sheets
6.description: A cloud-based spreadsheet software that enables users to create and edit spreadsheets online while collaborating with others in real-time.
